content: Yes, exploring existing literature and resources related to car maintenance and repair aligns with your department's COE of designing and delivering high-quality, cost-effective solutions that meet the unique needs of each client. By gaining a deeper understanding of the car problem and potential solutions through literature review, the design team can develop solutions that are informed by industry best practices and meet the car owner's specific needs and goals. This can result in a high-quality and cost-effective solution that satisfies the client and aligns with your department's expertise.
